description: A list of permissable values used to constrain an attribute's value.  A single domain may be assigned to multiple attributes in a table or database.

commonName.description: A short common name for the domain.

codeName.description: The code or 'lookup table' name for the domain used in the database schema definitions.

description.description: A brief description of the domain including identification of any established sources used in creating the list of domain items.

domainItem.description: An array of member objects that enumerate and define the valid values for a domain.
